name: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: This course covers the fundamental data structures and algorithms used in computer science, focusing on efficiency and performance.

name: Database Systems
description: An introduction to database systems, including database design, SQL, and transaction management.

name: Operating Systems
description: This course introduces the concepts of operating systems, including process management, memory management, and file systems.

name: Computer Networks
description: An overview of computer networking concepts, including network protocols, architectures, and security.
